Jang Chol meets delegate of Belarus 
     Pyongyang, April 11 (KCNA) -- Jang Chol, chairman of the organizing committee of the 18th April Spring Friendship Art Festival, met and had a talk with Boris Ivanov, first vice-Minister of Education who is a government cultural delegate of Belarus, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall today.
